channel.title: Post on jreslock.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Post on jreslock.github.io

item.title: Welcome/First Impressions
item.description:
Oh, hi there!

I mainly put this site together as a means to enable an evergreen and permanent place to keep my resume. In building the site I realized how much I like writing about technology. This discovery has prompted expanding the site into an actual blog, powered by hugo, github pages and the ananke theme.

Expect more articles in the next few weeks as I start working through the backlog of ideas, projects, outages and generally interesting technology-related topics.
